translations: 精英主义的，精英统治的；有优越感的

sentences.sentence: He found the school very cliquey and elitist.
sentences.translation: 他发现这所学校很排外并以精英自居。

sentences.sentence: He was an elitist who had no time for the masses.
sentences.translation: 他是个精英主义者，没时间给民众。

sentences.sentence: He worries about a time when college athletics become even more elitist than they are now.
sentences.translation: 他担心有一天大学体育运动会变得比现在更加精英主义化。
